title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 690.7 - Quorum for committee action
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 690.7 - Quorum for committee action

State Regulations
A majority of the entire committee
shall constitute a quorum for the transaction of business by a committee on
character and fitness if it consists of less than 10 members, and one fifth of
the entire committee, but not less than five members, shall constitute a quorum
if it consists of 10 or more members. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
690.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
